*Data Analyst Lab Technician for Dr. Andrew Wargo*

> Applied R (RStudio) and Excel to clean, analyze, and visualize datasets of 10,000+ samples, identifying patterns in environmental and biological samples.
    Analyzed disease resistance in rainbow trout, assessing how vaccines and selective breeding affect viral evolution, with implications for sustainable fish-farming practices
